        Throws:

      • configureJobFromClass

        public void configureJobFromClass(Class<?> clazz,
                         org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Job job)
                           throws ToolException
        Use any relevant annotations on the supplied class to configure the given job.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to reflect for mara-related annotations
        job - the job being configured
        Throws:
        ToolException - if reflection fails for any reason

      • defaultDriverIdForClass

        public String defaultDriverIdForClass(Class<?> driverClass)
        Constructs a default driver id based on the supplied class. This is the class name, minus any (Driver|Tool|Job) ending. It is also converted to lowercase and hyphenated between camelcase chars. Example: 'MyTestJob' becomes 'my-test'
        Parameters:
        driverClass - the driver class to use for building the id
        Returns:
        the id to use for this driver

                             JobInfo jobInfo)
                                  throws ToolException
        Throws:
        ToolException

      • getGenericTypeParams

        protected Type[] getGenericTypeParams(Field field)
        If this is a multiple output we're annotating, see if there are type parameters to use for the key/value classes.
        Parameters:
        field - the field to inspect
        Returns:
        the type parameters of the specified field.

      • getGenericTypeParams

        protected Type[] getGenericTypeParams(Class<?> clazz,
                          Class<?> lastAncestorClass)
        If this is a multiple output we're annotating, see if there are type parameters to use for the key/value classes.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the source class to reflect
        lastAncestorClass - specifies the bottom-most ancestor to stop at when walking up the tree.
        Returns:
        the parameterized types on the class.
